root: ^*You enter the club owned by Stephen. The bodyguards know you, so they instantly let you in. There is loud, stompy music, a lot of people on the dance floor and a few familiar faces - Kindred that happily choose Salumy as their favorite place to party and satisfy other needs safely.*
^*At the bar there’s Jeremiah, one of the club’s employees. He’s pouring some young brunette a drink, while surveying the room. Spotting you, he waves his hand at you to come closer.*
